propose.from sentence: Secondly , we propose a deep quadratic tree learning method and construct a single soft - cascade AdaBoost classifier to handle complex face manifolds and arbitrary pose and occlusion conditions .

simple pixel - level feature.from sentence: First , we propose a simple pixel - level feature , called the Normalized Pixel Difference ( NPD ) .

computed as.from sentence: An NPD is computed as the ratio of the difference between any two pixel intensity values to the sum of their values , in the same form as the Weber Fraction in experimental psychology .

such as: ability to reconstruct the original image

NPD feature.from sentence: The NPD feature has several desirable properties , such as scale invariance , boundedness , and ability to reconstruct the original image .

complex face manifold.from sentence: In this way , different types of faces can be automatically divided into different leaves of a tree classifier , and the complex face manifold in a high dimensional space can be partitioned in the learning process .

\" divide and conquer \" strategy.from sentence: This is the " divide and conquer " strategy to tackle unconstrained face detection in a single classifier , without pre-labeling of views in the training set of face images .

resulting face detector.from sentence: The resulting face detector is robust to variations in pose , occlusion , and illumination , as well as to blur and low image resolution .

NPD features.from sentence: we further show that NPD features can be obtained from a lookup table , and the resulting face detection template can be easily scaled for multiscale face detection .
